授業目的:
To enhance students' ability in critical analysis on regional approach and transnational policy framework for socio-economic and spatial development.
Students learn the skills and concepts to analyze regional development issues and policies in this course.
THE COURSE WILL BE HELD FACE-to-FACE. But it might take the ON-DEMAND Learning when COVID_19 problems continue. Please Check with the LUNA
到達目標:
Specific case studies on Urban Infrastructure in Europe and Asia will be illustrated, discussed and analyzed by students
- aiming that Students can make critical assessment / recommendation for development policy and UN programs.
Students can analyze regional development issues and policies in this course
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: Other Courses taught by the Teacher (O.K.LAI) Please Check with the LUNA or E-Mail from Prof.O-K.LAI
授業方法:
Class conducted in ENGLISH Only. THE COURSE WILL BE FACE-to-FACE. BUT Might be HELD ONLINE due to COVID_19 Pandemics_
Please Check with the LUNA or E-Mail from Prof.O-K.LAI
Lecture, Group Discussion, Case-Comparative Studies, Home-Work & Individual + Group Projects; When the Course is E-Learning "ON DEMAND" Please check with the LUNA

各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
